subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Art Official set a world record for 3-year-old pacers, and narrowly upset the previously undefeated Somebeachsomewhere in a thrilling Meadowlands Pace.
snippet: Art Official set a world record for 3-year-old pacers, and narrowly upset the previously undefeated Somebeachsomewhere in a thrilling Meadowlands Pace.
